ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: Radistor stops, but Arrow causes them to malfuction and they transform back to the Radicons. Stranato looked at Arrow angrily. Train Wreck and Airbomber join

Radistor stops, but Arrow causes them to malfuction and they transform back
to the Radicons. Stranato looked at Arrow angrily. Train Wreck and Airbomber
join Stranato's stare and Arrow looks at them repulsively (Ugh, sorry for
the bad spelling.)
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 7:09 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars RPG


> Ok, about the nemesis cannon thing: Liono did remove it from the Nemesis
> (don't ask me how, I wasn't there), but, for the good of the RPG (since
> everyone seems to want the cannon out), it is now officially on the
Nemesis,
> which is in the ocean.
>
> As for the Radistor VS Oblitertron thing: When I was giving you an exaple
of
> what's legal or what wasn't, Thecode, I gave you an example of someone
> stabbing someone or shooting someone at point blank range. That doesn't
> depend on the strength of the opponent, so it's legal. But twisting
someone's
> arms would depend on the other bot's strengh, so you'd need to wait for
him
> to respond.
>
> ::Zardus/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::
>
> Zardus spins around, looking at Cyber Claw. He looks from her to
Oblitertron
> and the conflict on the ground, an annoyed look on his face.
>
> "Wait," he says to Cyber Claw and proceeds to fly down toward the
conflict,
> his gun ready.
>
> "Allright," he says to the bots near the Ark, "Maximals, lower your
weapons.
> Oblitertron, stand down. The next bot to fire a shot dies."
>
> Zardus scans the bots in front of him, gun ready just in case.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Perndabot walks up near Zardus, his gun also ready. The huge bot looks
> threateningly at the maximals, ready to open fire.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Reptilica and Bloodystrike return to the alliance base, dropping off the
> energon they had mined.
>
> "I NEVER want to see another energon cube in my life!!" Bloodystrike yells
> out, throwing a box against the wall, "And don't say anything!" he snaps
at
> Reptilica.
>
> Reptilica chuckles, walking off toward the bridge, Bloodystrike following
> him. Once there, he sees the conflict near the Ark on the scanners.
>
> "Hey, Bloodystrike, want to come with me and check this out?" he asks his
> partner.
>
> Bloodystrike nods. "Might as well."
>
> The two bots exit the base, setting off toward the Ark.
>
